title: Verify that Labor Joint Exhibit Rosters can be saved correctly as of 08/31
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in with permissions for Roster Management
AND user has navigated to Roster Management from Utilities on the left nav
AND user has entered the following filters
Org=All
Level=All Major & Minor 
Save Roster As=Labor Joint Exhibit
custom_expected: THEN system should save current rosters as Labor Joint Exhibit (08/31)

title: Verify that new Payroll Report for 08/31 Labor Joint Exhibit Rosters can be created via Payroll Report Utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 08/31 rosters have been saved via roster management [C1126401]
AND BOC user has navigated to the Payroll Utility 
AND has selected 2017 from the  "Year" dropdown and "New" from the "Type" dropdown  
AND has selected a date in the "As of" datepicker
AND user has selected "08/31" in the "Save As" dropdown 
AND the Generate Button is now active
custom_expected:
THEN  Clicking Generate will generate the CBT Impact Player Details Report, and the LRD Impact Player Details report and display the report in the utility, per the wireframe (styling and other specifics to be handled in follow up stories). 
AND CBT Impact Player Details will be displayed by default. 

AND Wireframe:
http://copbdc.axshare.com/#p=payroll_report

title: Verify that previously saved Payroll Report for 08/31 Joint Labor Rosters can be run via Payroll Report Utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 08/31 Payroll Report has already been generated via Payroll Report Utility [C1126400]
AND BOC user is logged in
AND BOC user has navigated to Payroll Report Utility
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects 2017 in the "Year" dropdown
AND user selects "08/31" in the "Type" dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN the View button should become active 
AND clicking View should load the saved report for 08/31
AND Wireframe:
http://copbdc.axshare.com/#p=payroll_report
